column5: As an Accountant you have a wide range of industries and locations to choose from in virtually any country in the world. You can work for known accountancy firms or you can become a consultant, offering freelance services to a range of industries. At Aberdeen teaching expertise is linked to the world of finance to ensure your experience is both practical and rigorous. You have access to a University Trading room, used by professional services companies and you can earn data stream certificates to demonstrate your ability to handle the professional tools.
